# Vape Product Tagger Training Template

QLoRA fine-tuning pipeline for AI-powered product tagging.

## Requirements
- 24GB+ VRAM (RTX 4090, A5000, A6000, etc.)
- 50GB+ disk space for model and checkpoints

## Quick Start
```bash
cd /workspace
git clone https://github.com/shand-j/python.git
cd python/vape-product-tagger
pip install -r vastai/requirements-train.txt
huggingface-cli login
python train_tag_model.py --train --input training_data.jsonl
```

## Environment Variables
Set in Vast.ai instance or .env:
- HF_TOKEN: Hugging Face access token
- HF_REPO_ID: Target repo for LoRA adapters
- WANDB_API_KEY: (optional) Weights & Biases logging
